fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Culture and media, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives:
- Digital Single Market 
- Intellectual Property 
- Copyright Law 
- IPR Enforcement 
- General Data Protection Regulation 
- Interoperability & Standards
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: EISi is a Slovak-based non-profit organization focusing on the overlap of technology, law & information society. It also serves as a non-academic research center for Internet law and Intellectual Property law.
